main event: Several civilian eye-witnesses observed an intense bluish-white light traveling at high speed in Canadian, Texas on the night of December 27, 1952.
interesting points: The object emitted a tail of fire exhaust while traveling at an estimated speed of 300 to 1000 mph., Witnesses described the light as comparable to that of a blue light bulb and noted that it did not resemble any known aircraft., The object was seen for approximately 2 to 3 minutes and climbed to an altitude of about 1.5 miles., Witnesses reported that no sound was heard during the observation despite the object's high speed., It was observed by five individuals, all of whom confirmed the sighting.
sighted object: intense bluish-white light with a tail of fire
